location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Printed letter No.132 of 1863 from Lieutenant-Colonel Lewis Pelly, Acting Political Resident and Consul General, Persian Gulf , Bushireto Henry Lacon Anderson, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a report by Henry W Warner, Commanding the Residency Schooner Georgiana, on the Bay of Shewoo and its village written 30 October 1863.The report gives details of the layout of the bay and its surrounding land and detailed information on the villagers, their trades and relations with other villages.
